Detailed Description

Main component class.

Advanced table control implementation.

Features:

  • composite rows/columns.
  • sorting and filtering.
  • MCV design (designed after Java(tm) JTable classes). Data accesed through wxAdvTableModel, renderered by wxAdvCellRenderer, edited by wxAdvCellEditor
  • rows/columns dynamic add/remove support
  • TODO: add printing support
  • TODO: add filters support

NOTES: There are two types of cell coordinates: table and model. Table coordinate used everywhere in table, when you click on cell, when you access data through wxAdvTable::GetCellValue. Model coordinates used by model.
